input.sentences: he had his morning coffee to prepare for his ride .
he looked over the mountain to see the view .
the front entrance to the church .
good friends posing for a photo .
riding through the city to get to the mountain .
output.sentences: While on vacation, I prepare my mornings with a cup of coffee before my ride.
I enjoy looking at the view of the mountain from my room.
We decided to stop and tour the front enterence of a church.
We took a friend group photo and posed while sightseeing.
We continued on with our vacation by riding bikes through the city and mountains.
